com.brogrammers.agora.data

Class QuestionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brogrammers.agora.data.QuestionController

  • public class QuestionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for directing data to and from the views and data managers.
    Author:
    Group02

      • searchQuestions

        public java.util.List<Question> searchQuestions(java.lang.String query)
        Passes on a search query to the ESDataManager, and returns the matching Question objects. If there is no connection, throws an exception to notify the calling view.
        Parameters:
        query - A string containing the user's input to a search box
        Returns:
        A list of questions matching the user's query

      • searchAnswers

        public java.util.List<Answer> searchAnswers(java.lang.String query)

      • addQuestion

        public java.lang.Long addQuestion(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String body,
                         byte[] image,
                         boolean location)
        Called when a user submits a question. Uploads the question to the ESDataManager and the CacheDataManager.
        Parameters:
        title - user input - Question title
        body - user input - Question body
        image - user input - an image to be uploaded with the question (null if no image provided)
        location - boolean to indicate whether addQuetion is attaching location to the question object
        Returns:
        the ID of the created question

      • addAnswer

        public java.lang.Long addAnswer(java.lang.String body,
                       byte[] image,
                       java.lang.Long qID,
                       boolean location)
                         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Called when a user submits an answer to an existing questions. Creates the answer object then passes it to the DataManagers to be attached to the appropriate question.
        Parameters:
        body - user input - Answer body
        image - user input - an image to be uploaded with the answer (null if no image provided)
        qID - the ID of the question that the Answer is to be added to.
        location - boolean to indicate whether to attach a location to the answer object
        Returns:
        the ID of the created Answer
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • addComment

        public void addComment(java.lang.String body,
              java.lang.Long qID,
              java.lang.Long aID,
              boolean location)
        Called when a user submits a comment to an existing questions. Creates the comment object then passes it to the DataManagers to be attached to the appropriate question or answer.
        Parameters:
        body - user input - Comment body
        qID - the ID of the question that the comment will be associated with.
        aID - null if the comment is on the question directly, otherwise the ID of the answer being commented on.
        location - boolean will determine whether or not a comment contains a location

      • upvote

        public void upvote(java.lang.Long qID,
          java.lang.Long aID)
            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Called when a user upvotes a question or answer. Increments the rating count in the DataManagers.
        Parameters:
        qID - The ID of the question being upvoted, or the question containing the answer being upvoted.
        aID - The ID of the answer being upvoted, or null if a question is being upvoted.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • getAllQuestions

        public java.util.List<Question> getAllQuestions()
        If there is an active network connection, this method returns an empty list initially, which will then be populated asynchronously by the ESDataManager. If there is no network connection, the list of questions in the cache is returned.
        Returns:
        The list of all questions on either the server or in the cache

      • getQuestionById

        public java.util.List<Question> getQuestionById(java.lang.Long id)
        If there is an active network connection, this method returns an empty List which will be populated asynchronously with the single question matching the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the question being requested
        Returns:
        a list which will contain the single question.

      • searchQuestionsByLocation

        public java.util.List<Question> searchQuestionsByLocation()

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called by a DataManager when it successfully populates a list requested by the controller. Notifies the registered observer.

      • setObserver

        public void setObserver(Observer observer)
        Before requesting data, views use this method to register themselves to receive a callback when the data is successfully retrieved.
        Parameters:
        observer - a view that will request data from the controller

      • addCache

        public void addCache(java.lang.Long id)
        Adds a question to the local cache
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the question

      • addFavorite

        public void addFavorite(java.lang.Long id)
        Adds a question to the local cache and marks it as a favorite
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the question
